description.title: Money-Splitter
description.value: This app will help you to split a receipt between friends fast and fairly.

people.description: At first add at least 2 people

families.enable: Enable people grouping by families. We can reduce transactions count, in case only one man from a family will pay/receive money
families.description: Create families and group people by families. It is not necessary to create families for single people

spendings.description: Now add all spendings you want to split

summary.description: In the following table you can see summary of all spendings. Red rows are families/people who owe money. Green rows are families/people who paid for others.

transactions.description: Here you can see a list with optimized transactions you and your friends should make to pay all debts between each other
